summary: This ENB preset combines fantasy, immersion and cinematics in a very nice way. High Quality/Performance for ENB Series v0.236. Enb built on a R9 380
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://account.msi.com/includes/images/design_dragoon.png[/img]

[center][size=4]Installation:[/size]

[b]STEP 1:[/b]
[b]- Download 0.236 version [/b][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0305.htm]ENB [/url][b], ( best version for amd cards to me ).[/b]
[b]- Unzip it. Inside you will find two folders : "WrapperVersion" and "InjectorVersion".[/b]
[b]- Copy only "d3d9.dll", "enbhost.exe" from "WrapperVersion" folder  into your Skyrim root directory ( usually: x:\program files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim ). NOT data folder[/b]

[b]STEP 2:[/b]
[b]- Download my files.[/b]
[b]- Extract it.[/b]
[b]- Select all files from [ Skyrim folder ].[/b]
[b]- Copy selected files into your Skyrim root directory.[/b]
[b]- Download the original 'Natural Lighting and Atmospherics' esp file from the following link and active it with MO or NMM[/b]
[b]      [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?[/url]


[b]-Download Mindflux's ENB Particle Patch and Sub-Surface Scattering Patch for Skyrim from the following links:[/b]
[b] [/b][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/8940928/Skyrim_Particle_Patch_for_ENB-All-In-One.zip]Mindflux Particle Patch All-in-One[/url]
[b] [/b][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/8940928/Skyrim_Subsurface_Scattering_Patch_for_ENB.zip]Mindflux Sub-Surface Scattering Patch[/url]

[b]STEP 3:[/b]
[b]- Edit enblocal.ini from my mod archive using this guide  [/b][url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENBlocal_INI]Enblocal.ini Guide [/url]
[b]- For ENBSeries to work properly the following values must be set to 1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini:[/b]
[b] bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/b]
[b] bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/b]
[b] bDrawLandShadows=1[/b]
[b] bShadowsOnGrass=1[/b]
[b] bDeferredShadows=1[/b]




[size=3]If you are installing ELFX, use only core files![/size]


[font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=5][b][u]Update! Officially Released V1![/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Arial]To upgrade from Wip version use this awesome tool![/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7804/?]ENB Manager[/url]

[/size][/font][b]Remove all files then follow my instruction from step 1[/b][/center]

[center]
[size=3]      [/size][youtube]prdi1GI69rc[/youtube][/center]
[center]
[size=3]Also Subscribe at my channel here! : https://goo.gl/nNyH26[/size]
[size=3]We're going to have fun guys! And i want you all with me![/size]

Tested with my pc : I5 4440, 8gb ram ddr3 and MSI R9 380 4 gb and High preset settings

In most demanding areas ( like whiterun grass land ) I have 45+ fps with 2k texture mod , SMIM meshes , SFO trees , Grass mod and HD LODs

So this preset is not ultra light but neither too much heavy!


Of course is still a WIP so I need your feedbacks for performance and quality![/center]

[i]FEATURES:[/i]

[size=3][center][font=Arial]-Subtle SSAO and Bokeh Dof
-Bloom 
-Warm colours 
-Sunray effect
-Lensflare
[/font][font=Arial]-Good performance 
-Slightly cinematic
-Very good for gameplay
[/font]



MOS USED FOR VIDEO AND SCREENSHOOTS:

[font=Verdana][b][size=3]Pure Water
Enhanched Lights and FX ( core files only )
Book of Silence
[/size]NobleSkyrim 2k
Skyrim HD Terrein Parallax Tribute
SMIM
Skyrim High Definiton LODs - Dark Lods
Unbelievable Grass Two
Skyrim Flora OverHaul 2.0 Trees only

[/b][/font][/center][/size][size=4][font=Arial][size=3][center][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3OmvMyQ.jpg?1[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/8wVS8Tp.jpg?1[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qGA32Ce.jpg?1[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/JPJUXpa.jpg?1[/img]
[/size][/font][left][/left]

[center][font=Verdana][u]Useful tweaks for a better Skyrim experience :

[color=#6fa8dc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48387/?]REAL uGRIDS to load SOLUTION and MORE[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55921/?][color=#6fa8dc]Skyrim Graphics Guide[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50244/?]Skyrim Stability Guide[/url][/color][/u][/font][/center]



[/size]
author: kurraudo

files.changelogHtml:
Better color palette with a touch of red
Smaller Sunrays
Adjusted interior lighting and color
